survey_title: Telecommunication Infrastructure and Services Survey in Somalia
description: This survey aims to collect information about the current state of telecommunication services, challenges, and user experiences in Somalia. Your responses will help improve telecommunication services in the country.

questions.question: Which city or region do you live in?
Which telecommunication provider do you currently use?
What telecommunication services do you use regularly?
How would you rate the quality of telecommunication services in your area?
What challenges do you face with telecommunication services?
Are telecommunication services affordable for you?
What improvements would you like to see in telecommunication services in Somalia?
Would you support government and private sector initiatives to expand telecommunication infrastructure?
